subject: Re: (unknown)
author: jace_777
full_text:
Hi Andrea!! It's nice to see you here. LOL do you remember me (Jody 
Cupp from western Michigan)?

Everyone this is the lady that convinced me I could investigate my own 
home and an amazing photo of family members and those I don't know was 
manifested in my little boys picture that I had laying on my dresser 
with the use of my brand new digital camera!

found
